Armando Faz Hernández

PhD Candidate of Computer Science degree at University of Campinas. Candidato a doutor em Ciencias da Computação pela Universidade Estadual de Campinas. (Texto informado pelo autor)

Título: Implementación multinúcleo de la multiplicación escalar en curvas de Koblitz,Ano de Obtenção: 2012.
Orientador: José Francisco Rambó Rodríguez Henríquez.

Artigos completos publicados em periódicos

1.
Faz-Hernández, Armando2019 Faz-Hernández, Armando; López, Julio ; DAHAB, RICARDO . High-performance Implementation of Elliptic Curve Cryptography Using Vector Instructions. ACM TRANSACTIONS ON MATHEMATICAL SOFTWARE, v. 45, p. 1-35, 2019.

2.
Faz-Hernandez, Armando2017 Faz-Hernandez, Armando; LOPEZ, JULIO ; OCHOA-JIMENEZ, EDUARDO ; RODRIGUEZ-HENRIQUEZ, FRANCISCO . A Faster Software Implementation of the Supersingular Isogeny Diffie-Hellman Key Exchange Protocol. IEEE TRANSACTIONS ON COMPUTERS, v. 67, p. 1-1, 2017.

3.
Faz-Hernández, Armando2015 Faz-Hernández, Armando; LONGA, PATRICK ; Sánchez, Ana H. . Efficient and secure algorithms for GLV-based scalar multiplication and their implementation on GLV-GLS curves (extended version). Journal of Cryptographic Engineering, v. 5, p. 31-52, 2015.

4.
Taverne, Jonathan2011 Taverne, Jonathan ; Faz-Hernández, Armando ; Aranha, Diego F. ; Rodríguez-Henríquez, Francisco ; Hankerson, Darrel ; López, Julio . Speeding scalar multiplication over binary elliptic curves using the new carry-less multiplication instruction. JOURNAL OF CRYPTOGRAPHIC ENGINEERING, v. 1, p. 187-199, 2011.

2.

3.
Faz-Hernández, Armando; López, Julio . Fast Implementation of Curve25519 Using AVX2. In: Kristin Lauter; Francisco Rodríguez-Henríquez. (Org.). Lecture Notes in Computer Science. 1ed.: Springer International Publishing, 2015, v. 9230, p. 329-345.

4.
Faz-Hernández, Armando; LONGA, PATRICK ; Sánchez, Ana H. . Efficient and Secure Algorithms for GLV-Based Scalar Multiplication and Their Implementation on GLV-GLS Curves. In: Josh Benaloh. (Org.). Lecture Notes in Computer Science. 1ed.: Springer International Publishing, 2014, v. 8366, p. 1-27.

5.
Aranha, Diego F. ; Faz-Hernández, Armando ; López, Julio ; Rodríguez-Henríquez, Francisco . Faster Implementation of Scalar Multiplication on Koblitz Curves. In: Alejandro Hevia, Gregory Neven. (Org.). Lecture Notes in Computer Science. 1ed.: Springer Berlin Heidelberg, 2012, v. 7533, p. 177-193.

6.
Taverne, Jonathan ; Faz-Hernández, Armando ; Aranha, Diego F. ; Rodríguez-Henríquez, Francisco ; Hankerson, Darrel ; López, Julio . Software Implementation of Binary Elliptic Curves: Impact of the Carry-Less Multiplier on Scalar Multiplication. In: Bart Preneel, Tsuyoshi Takagi. (Org.). Lecture Notes in Computer Science. 1ed.: Springer Berlin Heidelberg, 2011, v. 6917, p. 108-123.
